Text: I think everyone has been stuck on 98.4% for a while now! But, if you open it with VLC media player, it will ask you if you want to repair it and in less than 30 seconds it plays the whole thing perfectly! Thanks TvTeam.
Im stucked at 99.9% but the video and audio is playing ok till before the last contestant of the wipeout zone.tnx anyway :)
